name: Break Fast!
description:
The truck delivering you and your brethren has lost control! Break down the door and escape before the truck crashes. Only then can you fulfill your destiny.

Controls:

There are 3 different attacks. Jumping attack, basic attack with no directional input, and a strong attack by holding left or right and pressing the attack button

Keyboard:

  • a: move left
  • d: move right
  • space/w: jump
  • j: attack
  • ESC: return to main menu

Controller:

Only on downloaded game

  • Joystick for left and right movement
  • Y or Triangle: jump
  • X or Square: attack
  • Select: return to main menu
